sen.e: It was originally compiled as poems attached to paintings on folding screen offered when FUJIWARA no Ishi, a daughter of FUJIWARA no Michinaga, entered into court, and later it was presented as a wedding gift at the wedding of the daughter of Kinto and FUJIWARA no Norimichi.

sen.e: At that time, Roei (recitation), which was to recite excellent poems and waka selecting ones most appropriate to various occasions public or private including tanka parties, was highly prized as it warm up the parties.
